document.full_text: dialed in drew the eighth starting position in a 20-horse field for saturday's 137th running of the kentucky derby at churchill downs and was established as the early 4-1 favorite on wednesday.
document.title: early favorite dialed in drawn for eighth position
lines_and_colors: dialed in drew the eighth starting position in a 20-horse field for saturday's 137th running of the kentucky derby at churchill downs and was established as the early 4-1 favorite on wednesday.
